meanings.definition: A malignant progressive disease in which the bone marrow and other blood-forming organs produce increased numbers of immature or abnormal leukocytes.
meanings.sent1: Leukaemia can affect the bone marrow and blood organs.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed her with leukaemia after a blood test.
meanings.sent3: The clown joked that even leukaemia cells can't resist a good party.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against illness, leukaemia is a formidable opponent.
meanings.sent5: The image of leukaemia cells multiplying uncontrollably is haunting.
